title: Inclusive Online Learning Design: Strategies for Application in Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science knowledge and experience with online learning tools
context.additional_context: A course focused on acquiring accessibility enhancement strategies for pre-service science teachers and educational professionals.

learning_goals: Learners can explain methods for creating science education digital content that complies with WCAG 2.1 standards
Learners can apply an inclusive learning activity design process considering various types of disabilities
Learners can propose strategies for integrating UDL (Universal Design for Learning) principles into science curriculum development
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
